name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「別世界」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Another world＂【#天音かなた3周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [szUbg1Yar5c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Romeo to Cinderella'.
Interlude transition with visual effects and dramatic soundscapes.

subtitles.original: あわよくばきっとあの娘も染まった
subtitles.english: If lucky, surely that girl too was tainted

subtitles.original: 落としたなんて嘘ついて
subtitles.english: Saying "I dropped it" as a lie

subtitles.original: そうよね私も同じよ
subtitles.english: That's right, I'm the same

subtitles.original: だってもっと愛されたいわ
subtitles.english: Because I want to be loved even more

subtitles.original: ほら私はここにいるよ
subtitles.english: Look, I am right here

subtitles.original: 私の心そっと覗いてみませんか
subtitles.english: Would you like to take a peek at my heart?

subtitles.original: 欲しいものだけあふれかえっていませんか
subtitles.english: Isn't it overflowing with only the things you want?

subtitles.original: まだ別腹よもっともっとぎゅっと詰め込んで
subtitles.english: I still have room, pack it in tighter and tighter

subtitles.original: いっそあなたの居場所まで埋めてしまおうか
subtitles.english: Shall I even go so far as to bury your place too?

subtitles.original: でもそれじゃ意味ないの
subtitles.english: But that would be meaningless

subtitles.original: 大きな箱より小さな箱に幸せはあるらしい
subtitles.english: It seems happiness is in a small box rather than a large one

subtitles.original: どうしようこのままじゃ私はあなたに嫌われちゃうわ
subtitles.english: What should I do? At this rate, I'll be hated by you

subtitles.original: でも私より欲張りなパパとママは今日も変わらず
subtitles.english: But Papa and Mama, greedier than me, are the same today as ever

subtitles.original: そうよね素直でいいのね
subtitles.english: That's right, it's okay to be honest

subtitles.original: 落としたのは金の斧でした
subtitles.english: What I dropped was a golden axe

subtitles.original: 嘘つきすぎたシンデレラ オオカミに食べられたらしい
subtitles.english: Cinderella, who lied too much, seems to have been eaten by a wolf

subtitles.original: どうしようこのままじゃ私もいつかは食べられちゃうわ
subtitles.english: What should I do? At this rate, I too will be eaten someday

subtitles.original: あ、その前に助けに来てね
subtitles.english: Ah, before that, come save me

subtitles.original: ジッタードール 作詞・作曲niki
subtitles.english: Jitter Doll - Lyrics & Composition: niki

subtitles.original: 雨上がる途中の雫眺めて
subtitles.english: Watching the droplets as the rain stops

subtitles.original: 右目にコネクタ繋ぐ動力
subtitles.english: Power connecting the connector to my right eye

subtitles.original: 乱れ 乱れ この温度で全て溶けるような
subtitles.english: Disordered, disordered, as if everything would melt at this temperature

subtitles.original: 飛ばせ 飛ばせ 滅ぶまで悲しみの世界へ
subtitles.english: Fly away, fly away, to the world of sorrow until it perishes

subtitles.original: そして操られる その世界に何が見える
subtitles.english: And being manipulated, what do you see in that world?

subtitles.original: 異常なほどに境界線がない 意志は
subtitles.english: The will, which strangely has no boundaries

subtitles.original: 人はそう それを愛とまだ呼んでいる
subtitles.english: People still call that love

subtitles.original: その愛を産みながら 愛し合う世界では
subtitles.english: In a world where they love each other while birthing that love

subtitles.original: 愛が与えられないものがいないと
subtitles.english: There is no one who isn't given love

subtitles.original: 繰り返す歴史をインストールして
subtitles.english: Installing the repeating history

subtitles.original: 青白く塗れよ 響く雷鳴
subtitles.english: Paint it pale white, the echoing thunder

subtitles.original: 繋げ 繋げ このコードで争いの世界へ
subtitles.english: Connect, connect, with this cord to the world of conflict

subtitles.original: 染まれ 染まれ パラサイトで血液の中まで
subtitles.english: Be stained, be stained, by the parasite into the blood

subtitles.original: そして何が見える それは空を砕く光
subtitles.english: And what do you see? It is the light that shatters the sky

subtitles.original: 狂うほどに不確定な動力 意志は
subtitles.english: The will, the power so uncertain it's maddening

subtitles.original: 人はそう それを命とまだ呼んでいる
subtitles.english: People still call that life

subtitles.original: その命を守りながら 奪い合う世界では
subtitles.english: In a world where they snatch away while protecting that life

subtitles.original: 涙流して嘆くものがいないと
subtitles.english: There is no one who sheds tears and laments

subtitles.original: 信じて
subtitles.english: Believe

subtitles.original: 雨上がる空に希望の跡
subtitles.english: Traces of hope in the rain-cleared sky

subtitles.original: 咲いた水溜り 鼓動の跡
subtitles.english: A puddle blossomed, traces of a heartbeat

subtitles.original: 起きてよ 起きてよ
subtitles.english: Wake up, wake up

subtitles.original: 錆びついた歯車が回りだす 繋がって
subtitles.english: The rusted gears start to turn, connected

subtitles.original: 愛を待つ生命を 人はそう 人とまだ呼んでいる
subtitles.english: Life that waits for love, people still call it human
